Channel a torrent of water through your hand, setting Wet on targets hit for 2 turns, and dousing burning surfaces.
If a Burning Ally is Doused, Mending is applied for 1 turn.
Mending restores [1] and does not damage the Undead.
Allies hit are cleansed of Slowed and Enwebbed.

Each bolt has a [2] chance to fork to a new target, up to [3] times max.

Magic Warfare
Rush forward in a straight line, to a designated point, hitting all enemies in your path for [1] and setting Knockdown.

Draw a random, temporary arrow from your quiver.
Arrows retrieved this way disappear after combat ends.

Fly into an unstoppable fury, gaining the following buffs:
Critical Chance +[1]%
Critical Damage +50%

Slaying an enemy extends Unrelenting Rage by an additional turn, up to the maximum (3), and provides a stacking +[3]% Damage Boost.
Ending your turn without attacking, or getting disabled ends Unrelenting Rage.

Release an orb of dark fire, dealing [1] and applying Soul Burn.
Damage/Range/Explosion Radius scales with the amount of every enemy that has died.
Casting this spell resets the bonuses accumulated.
The sure-fire, instant death wombo combo, done live.
